imdb.plot outline: A young man (Tareq) adopts the extremist Jehadi ideology. Some extremists convince him to travel to Afghanistan to join the Taleban. After discovering that, his parents travel to Tora Bora in Afghanistan to look for him and bring him back safely to home after loosing all traces of him. In Afghanistan, the parents witness the dangerous changes that came upon this hot region of the world as they look for their missing son.
imdb.title: Tora Bora
plot: A young man (Tareq) adopts the extremist Jehadi ideology. Some extremists convince him to travel to Afghanistan to join the Taleban. After discovering that, his parents travel to _Tora Bora_ (qv) in Afghanistan to look for him and bring him back safely to home after loosing all traces of him. In Afghanistan, the parents witness the dangerous changes that came upon this hot region of the world as they look for their missing son.::Anonymous
